document.full_text: the economic damage from japan's massive earthquake and tsunami last month is likely to be worse than first thought as power shortages curtail factory output and disrupt supply chains, the country's economics minister warned on tuesday.
document.title: japan quake's economic impact worse than first feared
lines_and_colors: the economic damage from japan's massive earthquake and tsunami last month is likely to be worse than first thought as power shortages curtail factory output and disrupt supply chains, the country's economics minister warned on tuesday.
